plot: With his nascent operation at stake, Oz makes a desperate move to turn the tables. Meanwhile, Sofia strives to build a new legacy for herself.

Sofia takes over what's left of the Falcone family, renames it the Gigante Family after her departed mother, and forms an alliance with Sal Maroni to kill Oz, who murdered Sal's wife and son. Oz and Victor go into hiding with Francis and what's left of the Bliss mushrooms.—Gislef
